package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Implementation of the JPEG-2000 standard, Part 1
package-manager.description: This package contains an implementation of the image compression standard JPEG-2000, Part 1. It consists of tools for conversion to and from the JP2 and JPC formats.
